description: The coach of Argentina in the Captain Tsubasa series. He is a good friend of http://anidb.net/ch30219 [Roberto Hongou]. At a certain point in the story, Barbas is interested in bringing http://anidb.net/ch2083 [Oozora Tsubasa] to the Argentinian football league in order to allow Tsubasa to grow to his full potential, which makes Roberto realize his mistake in leaving Tsubasa in Japan.
name: Diego Barbas
